msg: Use the dedicated S2SEndpoint instead of TCPEndpoint

msg: Logging IOExceptions on info level and not trying to send stanzas to client on IO exceptions

author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3289 - ActiveMQ has problems storing >4K messages in Oracle - brought BlobAdapter up to speed and added @Override to other adapters to catch this sort of problem in the future
